subject: Basketball (College)
Music
lead_paragraph: Brandon Sherrod, a starting forward for the Yale men’s basketball team, took off this school year to sing, perform and travel with the Whiffenpoofs, the university’s all-male a cappella group.
snippet: Brandon Sherrod, a starting forward for the Yale men’s basketball team, took off this school year to sing, perform and travel with the Whiffenpoofs, the university’s all-male a cappella group.
